CustomField.formula: IF(ProductAttributeValueId__r.Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == "MPW",'Please select if you need a Demo/trial pack, which already includes 50 PTV and GIS users.','In case of Altiplano FastMile Controller required, some Professional Services are mandatory. Pls contact with your PSM to request your Services quotation.FastMile devices can be managed via an Access Control Server (ACS). In case the ACS is from a 3rd party vendor, Nokia can provides Integration Services that make the interoperability easy and workable. Information about these Integration Services can be found in the Partner Portal.'+BR()+'In line with what is already established for PON ONT, FastMile warranty is granted with a free-of-charge oversupply of such Product in such quantity as equals two (2%) percent of the quantity of Products purchased and licensed by Partner; Nokia does not provide repair services for this type of end user devices.')
CustomField.label: Guidance
